'''Torn Letter''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained through exploration in [[Toyac Springs]]. This item is used in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Lost Packages Retrieval]]''. Showing this item to [[NPC]] [[Michica]] changes it into [[Tirda's Letter]].
